marketing information: The PT1700MX 17" touch screen monitor is perfect for use in healthcare, retail, point-of-sale and hospitality applications. Easily integrated with a variety of POS, thin client or PC systems, the monitor features a 5-wire resistive touch screen and dual serial/USB touch screen interface. Available in black or white, users may use a finger, gloved hand, credit card, pen or stylus to activate the resistive touch screen.
